entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
